name: EUROPEAN INSTITUTE FOR POLICY AND ANALYSIS
goal: The European Institute for Policy and Analysis (ERIPA) is a non-profit, non-governmental research and policy organisation based in Brussels. It aims to better comprehend and tackle current and emerging challenges that cut across politics, society and religion in and around Europe. It carries out and supports quality research and scholarly analysis on issues of relevance to Europe and its neighbouring regions that span socio-political, socio-cultural and socio-religious challenges. It stimulates thinking to fashion practical policy recommendations in pertinent areas and to develop policy-relevant insights. It also fosters constructive debate and exchange of views among various stakeholders in European policy-making processes.
interests: Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU Foreign Policy
EU Neighbourhood and Enlargement Policy
EU Social Policies
Countering Violent Extremism
Social Cohesion, Migration, Education
